title: Old Undead Retaliator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Resurrect - Revive a dead player. May not target neutrals or evil factions. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: The player you resurrect Is immediately converted to the Unseen.

desc:
Post 1251
*Me after reviving a Pumpkin into a Cantaloupe.*
